thread.title: New York Mets vs. Los Angeles Dodgers NLDS Game 4 live score: Online stream, TV schedule
thread.title_full: New York Mets vs. Los Angeles Dodgers NLDS Game 4 live score: Online stream, TV schedule

author: Nick O'Malley | nomalley@masslive.com
title: New York Mets vs. Los Angeles Dodgers NLDS Game 4 live score: Online stream, TV schedule
text:
Channel : Click here for a channel finder to help pin down your local channel. Live Stream 
With the MLB postseason moving to national broadcasts, it's easier to get ahead of an online broadcast. Even the official MLB option is more reasonable. 
The National League games are all on TBS this postseason. Fortunately, TBS has a pretty solid streaming option for desktop and mobile. 
MLB.tv Postseason Package - A package from the league that lets you catch postseason games streaming on your computer and other devices. May not include all ALCS/NLCS games. 
TBS.com (or TBS Mobile app ) - The more reasonable options for those who don't want to pay for a seperate service. 
--- 
The Dodgers took an early lead in Game 3. However, the Mets' power show blew the doors of the competition in the 13-7 win. Now, all that stands between New York and a trip to the NLCS is one of the best pitchers in baseball: Clayton Kershaw. 
Kershaw is swimming in Cy Young awards, but has been questioned about his playoff performances in the past. With the season on the line the stakes may never be higher for Kershaw in establishing his lasting playoff legacy. 
Meanwhile, the Mets will be sending another one of their promising young starters to the mound in Game 4. This time around, it's 24-year-old Steven Matz.
